divs: sighting detailswhen i was 16 i was outside my house in texas in the backyard, my brother had reminded me it was going to be a lunar eclipse that night and i was bored and i am fascinated by stuff like that so i went to watch. i'll say the eclipse was about one quarter completed when i sat down on my small back porch and started watching, then about three quarters through the complete blackout of the moon, i notice to my right [coming from an easterly direction heading west] some lights. of course i wasn't thinking hey what's that! houston's not far and we get a lot of planes buzzin around. so i glanced over and immediatly i noticed something odd about it. no blinking lights. just 3 white lights. i still didn't think much of it so i continued to glance back and forth from the moon to the object[s?] cruisin along the skyline. it started to bother me quite a bit, because i've always been a bit of a skywatcher for weird stuff like this, and i had the twinge in my head like, man don't take your eyes off this you never know. and then it passed between me and the moon. dead silent. nothing there. just....lights. 3 lights, a perfect triangle. not blinking. then it took off, and not like you see in the movies, like instantly to warp 9, it was like a rev up from slow to light speed, but it hung long enough for me to see sort of a trail. and it kind of lit the clouds on the horizon a bit, like in passing. then something went after it. a purple\blue cylinder[beam?] with a sort of tail behind it. and that lit the sky up for real. followed suit after the ufo, same direction. i've seen something very similar to this in a video that's been aired of a nasa sts mission in which a ufo was traveling over the earth and it veered suddenly following a sort of flash and streak of light seeming to be aimed at the ufo. while the ufo was in my sight, and for quite some time after the events, like maybe 5-10 minutes i was absolutely mortified. slack-jawed, scared to breathe, maybe i thought they could see me, who knows. but after i composed myself, i went inside and grabbed my brother's camcorder and went outside to see if maybe some more freaky stuff would happen. no more activity.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Dickinson
There were no other sightings in Dickinson on or around November 30th 1995
